text:
13
PROGRAM OFFERING
NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: WINDOW ON THE WORLD IV
Type: Talk
Time: 14:30
No.: 13 for this quarter
Origin: British Information Services
Audience: General
Serial Number: 56-54
Release Date: Upon arrival
Once again we are pleased to offer WINDOW ON THE WORLD, a series of interesting
and informative short talks by prominent British citizens. As with most of our
talk series, definite speakers and topics have not been lined up as yet. However,
when the titles and speakers are known to us, we will inform all stations.
